text: Ra unako samudayaka manisaharule unisamga vivada garna thale taba ‘‘unale bhaneki timi masamga allahako barema ke vivada gardachau’’ tyasale ta mala'i sahi bato dekha'isakeko cha ra jasala'i timile allahako sajhedara bana'umchau ma tinisamga dara'udaina. Allahako iccha nahunjela kunai kura humdaina. Sabai kurako janakari mero palanakartakai jnanako paridhibhitra pardacha. Ke timile tyo kurako vicara gardainau
